column2:
"Wow, that's a big one! If served as
sashimi, the volume should be able to
serve a few hundred customers."

"As it has no stench, I wonder if it will
be widely popular to be eaten as it is?"

"Since I have already thought of various
possible recipes, let me bring it back
and start working on it immediately."

"It looks like I'm going to be pretty busy!
Thanks for hearing me out."

"うわ、大きい！
お刺身なら何百人分にもなりそうね。"

"臭みもないし、これならたぶん癖もなく
さっぱりいただけるんじゃないかしら？"

"レシピはあらかじめいろいろ考えて
おいたし、まずは持って帰って
早めにさばいてみるわ。"

"また忙しくなりそう！　無理なお願いを
聞いてくれてありがとうね。"
